taskbody.prereq: All your screens and enquiries are added to the rim files and no highlighted errors can be seen in Design Studio Problems View. All the environment and system settings are correct.

step.cmd: Run As - with packager file selected.
step.stepresult: Once this has started monitor the output of the console window, looking for the successful completion and build as below.

taskbody.result: The war file is created and copied into the iris target directories. Given a theoretical project name of hothouse then you can expect to find the file in the hothouse-iris/target directory of the project root. The name of the war file itself being projectname-iris.war or hothouse-iris.war with given example.
